artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Collins & Aikman; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Unidentified but possibly PanAm fabric in various weaves, blue & brown. Nos. 6 - 13 are more boldly woven patterns in plain & plaid. Double weave. Two color variations woven together (blue & brown) each 27.5" wide. 2.25" x 1.25" plaid rectangles surrounded by 1.75" vert. & 1" horiz. solid bands. (Bright Blue Rec)
